attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this is to question the reason behind why a Drug like "alcohol" which induces violence is legal and is allowed to be distributed for a tax included price in the UK and, a drug like cannabis which causes a relaxed and happy felling is illegal.
True cannabis has been linked with mental health issues but is it not true that alcohol has been linked to liver problem and kidney problems e.g. liver and kidney failure.
I also know that you will say that this will send the wrong message to people but how is this different to the massage sent out by alcohol and its legal stature, but this isnt seen as a problem because alcohol is legal and there is a legal age limit for purchase and consumption but these messures could be introduce for cannabis as well.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/cannabisuk/
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
